label: Binance Private
name: binancePrivate
description: Binance Private APIs that require API and Secret keys

actions.label: Network
actions.name: network
actions.description: Network to execute API: Test or Live

options.label: Test New Order
options.name: postTestNewOrder
options.description: Test new order creation. Creates and validates a new order but does not send it into the matching engine.

options.label: Cancel All Open Orders on a Symbol
options.name: delOpenOrders
options.description: Cancels all active orders on a symbol. This includes OCO orders.

options.label: Query Current Open Orders
options.name: getOpenOrders
options.description: Get all open orders on a symbol.

options.label: Query All Orders
options.name: getAllOrders
options.description: Get all account orders; active, canceled, or filled.

options.label: Query Account Trade List
options.name: getMyTrades
options.description: Get trades for a specific account and symbol.

options.label: Query Current Order Count Usage
options.name: getOrderCountUsage
options.description: Displays the user's current order count usage for all intervals.

inputParameters.label: Time in Force
inputParameters.name: timeInForce
inputParameters.description: This sets how long an order will be active before expiration.

options.label: Good Til Canceled
options.name: GTC
options.description: An order will be on the book unless the order is canceled.

options.label: Immediate Or Cancel
options.name: IOC
options.description: An order will try to fill the order as much as it can before the order expires.

options.label: Fill or Kill
options.name: FOK
options.description: An order will expire if the full order cannot be filled upon execution.

inputParameters.label: Quantity
inputParameters.name: quantity
inputParameters.description: For MARKET order type, Quantity or Quote Order Quantity is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: Quote Order Quantity
inputParameters.name: quoteOrderQty
inputParameters.description: Specifies the amount the user wants to spend (when buying) or receive (when selling). For MARKET order type, Quantity or Quote Order Quantity is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: New Client Order Id
inputParameters.name: newClientOrderId
inputParameters.description: A unique id among open orders. Automatically generated if not sent. Orders with the same newClientOrderID can be accepted only when the previous one is filled, otherwise the order will be rejected.

inputParameters.label: Stop Price
inputParameters.name: stopPrice
inputParameters.description: For [STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT, TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT] order type, Stop Price or Trailing Delta is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: Trailing Delta
inputParameters.name: trailingDelta
inputParameters.description: For [STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT, TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT] order type, Stop Price or Trailing Delta is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: New Order Response Type
inputParameters.name: newOrderRespType
inputParameters.description: Set the response JSON. MARKET and LIMIT order types default to FULL, all other orders default to ACK.

inputParameters.label: Order Id
inputParameters.name: orderId
inputParameters.description: Order Id or Orig Client Order Id is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: Orig Client Order Id
inputParameters.name: origClientOrderId
inputParameters.description: Order Id or Orig Client Order Id is mandatory.

inputParameters.label: Order Id
inputParameters.name: orderId
inputParameters.description: Get orders >= Order Id. Otherwise most recent orders are returned. Not needed if Start Time and/or End Time provided.

inputParameters.label: From Id
inputParameters.name: fromId
inputParameters.description: TradeId to fetch from. Default gets most recent trades.
